text: niccayamāka avviruvarum pāvattiṟkuriyavarkaḷāki viṭṭārkaḷ eṉṟu kaṇṭu koḷḷappaṭṭāl, appōtu uṭaimai kiṭaikka vēṇṭum eṉak kōruvōrukku neruṅkiya uṟaviṉar iruvar (mōcam ceytuviṭṭa) avviruvariṉ iṭattil niṉṟu"avviruvariṉ cāṭciyattaiviṭa eṅkaḷiṉ cāṭciyam mika uṇmaiyāṉatu.
